preqs: It is recommended that students complete MGW1010 or MGG1010 before undertaking this unit

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGG1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC2120, MGF2351, MGW2351}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: The international environment including international trade and investment, and the legal, political, cultural and technological contexts faced by internationalising organisations; forms of operations available to the internationalising organisation; the impact of the multinational enterprise; international strategic planning.
